title: Finance ministry asks state-run banks to raise capital from markets - The Financial Express
content:
1. Finance ministry asks state-run banks to raise capital from markets  The Financial Express
  2. Finance ministry, state-run banks discuss 3-year strategic roadmap  Business Standard
  3. Finance Ministry Asks Banks To Strengthen Balance Sheet, Raise Capital From Market  Outlook India
  4. Finance Ministry tells PSBs to shore up balance sheets by raising capital  CNBCTV18
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: While credit flow has improved in recent months amid prodding by the government, bankers are yet to shun risk aversion considerably.
